mapper.insert: insert into members (userName, userId, userPw, userMajor, userStuNum, userPhon, userEmail) values(#{userName}, #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userMajor}, #{userStuNum}, #{userPhon}, #{userEmail})
mapper.select: select userName, userId, userPw, userMajor, userStuNum, userPhon, userEmail from members where userId = #{userId} AND userPw = #{userPw}
select userId from members where userId = #{userId}
